metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34478 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Apache Shiro, before 1.12.0 or 2.0.0-alpha-3, may be susceptible to a path traversal attack that results in an authentication bypass when used together with APIs or other web frameworks that route requests based on non-normalized requests. Mitigation: Update to Apache Shiro 1.12.0+ or 2.0.0-alpha-3+

criterions.comment: shiro: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
